SELECT b.e_board_key AS eBoardKey , b.e_board_no AS eBoardNo , b.e_board_title AS eBoardTitle , DATE_FORMAT(b.e_board_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS eBoardDate , b.k_user_key AS kUserKey , k.k_user_name AS kUserName FROM e_board b INNER JOIN k_user k ON(k.k_user_key = b.k_user_key) WHERE 1=1
AND ( LOWER(b.e_board_title) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%') OR LOWER(k.k_user_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%') )
AND LOWER(b.e_board_title) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%')
AND LOWER(k.k_user_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%')
ORDER BY b.e_board_key DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{cntPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM e_board b INNER JOIN k_user k ON(k.k_user_key = b.k_user_key) WHERE 1=1
AND ( LOWER(b.e_board_title) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%') OR LOWER(k.k_user_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%') )
AND LOWER(b.e_board_title) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%')
AND LOWER(k.k_user_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{searchWord}),'%')

SELECT b.e_board_key AS eBoardKey , b.e_board_no AS eBoardNo , b.e_board_title AS eBoardTitle , b.e_board_content AS eBoardContent , b.e_board_date AS eBoardDate , b.k_user_key AS kUserKey , k.k_user_name AS kUserName FROM e_board b INNER JOIN k_user k ON(k.k_user_key = b.k_user_key) WHERE b.e_board_key = #{eBoardKey}
SELECT file_key AS file_key , org_file_name AS org_file_name , ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM e_board_file WHERE e_board_key = #{eBoardKey} AND del_gbn = 'N' ORDER BY file_key ASC
SELECT file_key AS file_key , stored_file_name AS stored_file_name , org_file_name AS org_file_name FROM e_board_file WHERE file_key = #{fileKey}
